title: Agency Growth Starts with Existing Clients
description: Agency growth consultant, author, and podcast host Max Traylor discusses how marketing agencies can dramatically increase profitability by focusing on existing client relationships rather than constantly chasing new business. Max shared strategies for improving client retention through smarter pricing models and positioning your agency as a true marketing leader for clients. This insightful discussion offers practical guidance for agency owners looking to future-proof their business model and significantly boost their bottom line without the endless hustle for new clients.
